title: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work
description:
Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work.

Description: When selecting the color orange, it doesn't work as expected.
OB: The orange color doesn't apply when selected.
EB:
Preview.

Expected behavior: The selected color should be orange.

Actual behavior: The selected color is not orange.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the color selection menu.
2. Select the color orange.
3. Observe that the selected color is not orange.
